title: JStalin
author: JStalin
content: Hello! I am a college student looking to set up a cloud mining service in my dorm room. I am looking to buy a bitman s19j pro and sell shares of the profit to lower my upfront cost. Since my electricity is free in my dorm there will be no electricity fees making it more profitable. I take summer semesters so mining will happen year round I will be selling 100 shares for $70 each. If you are interested email me at dormroombtc@gmail.com or reply to me here.  Since there are thousands of scams on this forums I will dox myself, show proof of enrollment and we can find a way for me to offer collateral for the initial investment(unfortunately I’m broke or I would give collateral in btc).

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: JStalin on May 27, 2022, 08:38:03 AMHello! I am a college student looking to set up a cloud mining service in my dorm room. I am looking to buy a bitman s19j pro and sell shares of the profit to lower my upfront cost. Since my electricity is free in my dorm there will be no electricity fees making it more profitable. I take summer semesters so mining will happen year round I will be selling 100 shares for $70 each. If you are interested email me at dormroombtc@gmail.com or reply to me here.  Since there are thousands of scams on this forums I will dox myself, show proof of enrollment and we can find a way for me to offer collateral for the initial investment(unfortunately I’m broke or I would give collateral in btc).why would you share a profit with anyone at all? keep everything to yourself, you will quickly pay back the investment.If you have free electricity, what are actually your expenses (except the initial investment in buying mining hardware, which you definitely have to do)?All cloud mining services are a scam, none of them actually own mining equipment.

comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: Quote from: JStalin on May 27, 2022, 08:38:03 AMHello! I am a college student looking to set up a cloud mining service in my dorm room. I am looking to buy a bitman s19j pro and sell shares of the profit to lower my upfront cost. Since my electricity is free in my dorm there will be no electricity fees making it more profitable. I take summer semesters so mining will happen year round I will be selling 100 shares for $70 each. If you are interested email me at dormroombtc@gmail.com or reply to me here.  Since there are thousands of scams on this forums I will dox myself, show proof of enrollment and we can find a way for me to offer collateral for the initial investment(unfortunately I’m broke or I would give collateral in btc).from what i understand you want to buy mining equipment to mine bitcoin in college dorm, but you have 2 problems with that:1 - You are wrong when you think that the electricity in your dorm is free, if you use mining equipment then you will be making the college pay a high electricity bill per month, that is, you will be harming the college2 - mining equipment is noisy, meaning you will be causing pollution in your dormLastly:Don't harm college, if you want to do mining then do it in an appropriate place and don't do cloud mine, do mining for yourself
